name: Emerald Priestess - One of a Kind
description:
Exquisite piece for a special occasion, this necklace is a magical attribute full of pearls and faceted emerald beads carefully woven together to awaken your deepest beauty! The stones are set onto a solid piece of handcrafted white leather and woven through by a thin antique brass wire. Each run of wire has been twisted to produce a beautiful geometric pattern that repeats itself throughout the piece. A snake chain is outlining the top curve of the leather base and attaches to two intricate japanese chains that wrap around the neck to the clasp. The spiral key pendant is made with bronze clay, sculpted from scratch and fired into solid bronze. It resembles a serpent and a musical key to inspire the opening of your heart to communicate your innermost truth. 

This is a one-of-a-kind adornment designed and created for a one-of-a-kind woman!

name: Custom Patina/Color Treatment Add-On
description:
This is a purchase form for patina/color treatment you'd like to add to your *made to order* selection. Please note this listing is for one color. You may chose to order multiple color treatments at your own discretion. Select your color preference from the options in the drop-down menu below.

Items shown in pictures are displaying the various color options available for your customization.

name: Custom Chain Length Add-On
description: This is a purchase form for an additional 5" and 10" of chain you'd like to add to your *made to order* selection. Please note that this is the same style of chain, as the one shown in the picture of the jewelry you're purchasing. Select your add-on chain measurement from the options in the drop-down menu below.

name: Custom Engraving/Carving Add-On
description:
This is a purchase form for an personalized engraving/carving you'd like to add to your *made to order* selection. Please note that this is done by hand and thus will not look machined. Most carving will be done on the backside of the metal, unless otherwise specified. 

To specify what you'd like us to write, please fill out the "Notes to Seller" window during your purchase via Paypal. If you're requesting a symbol or image to be carved, make sure to fill out the Contact form with a return email address. We will contact you during regular business hours as soon as we receive your request.
